data.meta_site_name: Kevin Buchanan Obituary | March 25, 2021 | Woodlawn Funeral Home - Cranston, RI
data.text:
Kevin John Buchanan, 70, passed away Thursday March 25, 2021 at Rhode Island Hospital. He was the beloved husband of Karen Ann (Riley) Buchanan. Born in Providence, he was the son of the late John and Mary (O’Rourke) Buchanan.

Kevin was a lithographer before retiring. He loved socializing with his family, friends and neighbors. Kevin was fiercely proud of his four nephews, David, Ian, Colin and Nolan. He was an avid golfer and loved his New England Patriots.

Besides his wife, he is survived by two sisters, Debby Bizier and Nancy Buchanan.

Kevin’s funeral and burial will be private. In lieu of flowers memorial donations may be made to a charity of your choice in Kevin’s honor.

Please share memories and condolences at WoodlawnGattone.com
